problems.title: List Sum
problems.description: Sum all numbers in a list.

problems.title: Word Frequency
problems.description: Count frequency of each word in a string.
problems.starter_code:
from collections import Counter
text = input().split()
for word, count in Counter(text).items():
    print(f'{word}: {count}')

problems.title: Largest Product
problems.description: Find the largest product of two numbers in a list.
problems.starter_code:
nums = list(map(int, input().split()))
nums.sort()
print(max(nums[0]*nums[1], nums[-1]*nums[-2]))
